game.title: The Lost Treasure
game.objective: Find the hidden treasure in the ancient ruins.
game.description: You've heard rumors of a lost treasure buried within the heart of forgotten ruins. Your quest is to navigate the dangers and uncover the riches that lie hidden there.

task.objective: Obtain the map from the old sailor, Jack。
task.description: You need to persuade Jack, a retired sailor at the dock, to give you his珍藏的地图 that leads to the ruins.

task.objective: Travel to the ancient ruins and avoid the traps.
task.description: The map will guide you, but be cautious – the ruins are filled with deadly traps and puzzles.
